aboutRoute.title: Company 'World of Modern Transportation'
aboutRoute.question: Planning a trip from Ukraine to {country}?
aboutRoute.intro1: Choose comfortable international transfers from World of Modern Transportation!
aboutRoute.intro2: We operate routes from different regions of Ukraine to the key cities of the selected country.

aboutCompany.title: ABOUT US
aboutCompany.intro: We are ‘World of Modern Transportation’, providing professional passenger transportation services across Ukraine and to Europe since 2012, as well as delivery of small cargo, parcels and transfers.
aboutCompany.comfortTitle: Comfort and safety are our priority
aboutCompany.comfortIntro: Our fleet consists of modern minibuses of comfort and luxury classes, equipped with everything needed for a convenient long‑distance journey:
aboutCompany.drivers: Our drivers have extensive experience in international transportation and always care about the safety and comfort of every passenger.

roadAdvices.title: Tips for a comfortable bus trip from Ukraine to {country}
roadAdvices.intro: A bus journey is not just a transfer, but a full travel experience. If you are traveling to {country} from cities in Ukraine, use the tips from 'World of Modern Transportation' to make your road pleasant, convenient and interesting.

1.title: 1. Talk to fellow travelers and locals
1.text: At bus stops or transit points, you can always chat with locals or other passengers. It’s a great way to discover interesting places, cafes, historical sites and walking routes in the Netherlands.

2.title: 2. Take care of comfort on the road
2.text: Bring a light neck pillow, a bottle of water, headphones and warm clothes — especially at night, when air conditioners can make the cabin cool.

3.title: 3. Create your own playlist
3.text: A trip from Ukraine to the Netherlands is a great time to listen to music or audiobooks. Create your own travel playlist to make the time on the road pleasant and fly by faster.

4.title: 4. Don’t forget the documents
4.text: Before departure, check the availability of your passport, visa or a permit to cross the border (if needed). Prepare the documents in advance for border control.

5.title: 5. Save money without losing comfort
5.text: A bus is one of the most cost‑effective ways to travel to the Netherlands. The ticket price depends on the boarding place and destination and does not depend on currency fluctuations or fuel prices.

1.title: You submit a request
1.description: Fill out a short form on the website or write to us on Viber / WhatsApp / Instagram / Telegram

2.title: We contact you
2.description: A manager clarifies trip details, answers all questions, and reserves a seat

3.title: Payment for services
3.description: Booking is made with a 30€ prepayment, the remaining amount is paid at boarding in the way that is most convenient for you

4.title: We carry out the transfer
4.description: Arrive at the specified place and time — your trip will be comfortable, safe, and on time

5.title: Customer support
5.description: 24/7 support before, during, and after the trip — we are in touch with you

6.title: Loyalty program
6.description: Come back again and get discounts, bonuses, or priority booking.

benefits.title: From this moment, you no longer need to:

1.title: Comfort and safety
1.description: Comfort class minibuses are equipped with comfortable electrically adjustable seats, air conditioning and seat belts for maximum convenience during your trip. A technical inspection is carried out before each trip to ensure complete safety on the road.

2.title: Multimedia
2.description: Our minibuses are equipped with a TV and a modern multimedia system, allowing you to watch movies or listen to music during the trip. This creates a pleasant atmosphere in the cabin and makes the journey less tiring.

3.title: Experienced drivers
3.description: Our drivers have many years of experience in international transportation, know the routes well and always follow the traffic rules. They undergo regular checks to ensure the peace and safety of passengers on every trip.

4.title: Wi‑Fi and charging on the go
4.description: Comfort class minibuses offer free Wi‑Fi and USB/Type‑C chargers at every seat, so you can stay online and use your gadgets without restrictions while traveling.

1.title: Comfort and safety
1.description:
Luxury class minibuses feature spacious seats with electric adjustment and leg support for maximum comfort even on long trips. Blankets are provided for passengers.

A spacious refrigerator is available in the cabin. A full technical inspection is carried out before each trip to ensure a high level of safety and reliability on the road.

2.title: Multimedia
2.description: The cabin has a large LED TV with a modern multimedia system and high-quality sound. During the trip, movies, music or a calm background environment are available — for a comfortable mood throughout the entire route.

3.title: Experienced drivers
3.description: Drivers of luxury class minibuses have more than 10 years of transportation experience. They care not only about safe driving but also about making your trip pleasant from the very first minute.

4.title: Wi‑Fi and charging on the go
4.description: Luxury class minibuses offer high-speed Wi‑Fi, and each seat has USB, Type‑C, and a 220V outlet for charging laptops, tablets, or smartphones. You stay connected and productive even on the go.

1.title: European level of service
1.description: Just like in European transport companies

2.title: Comfort in every detail
2.description: Everything is designed for your convenience during the trip

3.title: Fast support
3.description: Our managers are available on Viber/WhatsApp/Instagram/Telegram 24/7

4.title: Convenient boarding points
4.description: Our routes are designed so that it is always easy for you to reach

items.name: Mykola Korobenko
items.text: Very good and reliable carrier, my family has been using it for more than a year. Reliable and proven. I recommend it to everyone.

items.name: Iryna Ivakhnenko
items.text: I want to thank World of Modern Transportation from the bottom of my heart! Everything as usual at the highest level! Safe, convenient, comfortable! Special thanks to driver Kola. The right person in the right place! I've been traveling for 3 years and recommend it to everyone! Thank you

items.name: Daryna Kohutenko
items.text: Best carrier! The bus is always clean and comfortable, drivers are attentive and friendly. Very grateful for the care and service! I recommend it to everyone who is looking for safe and reliable transportation abroad!

items.name: Tanya Shylo
items.text: Fast, quality, convenient. Drivers are polite, ready to help, with humor. 100% positive, 0% negative. We will continue to travel and recommend you. You are the best. Thank you.

items.name: Yulia Tarasova
items.text: I've been traveling abroad with such buses for more than 10 years and I will be pleasantly surprised to finally see luxury service: clean, soft comfortable seats in the cabin (important for a long journey), Wi-Fi and most importantly, a sensitive, kind, quick-witted, patient, cheerful driver Nikolay!

items.name: Yana Kolosa
items.text: I am very grateful to the World of Modern Transportation route and recommend it to everyone. Very comfortable, has Wi-Fi, air conditioning, reclining seats, it's very comfortable to sleep, the driver is 24/7 positive, humane, with humor and very pleasant, and most importantly, fulfills all passengers' wishes. I am immensely grateful to this company. With such comfort, I have been traveling for 15 years and am always satisfied

items.name: Oksana Yarmolenko
items.text: Very satisfied with the trip! The driver is polite and punctual, the luxury class bus is simply incredible. The trip went quickly and without problems. I will definitely travel again

items.name: Svitlana Korobenko
items.text: Best carrier. We have used them repeatedly, they live up to expectations, the cars are comfortable and convenient, the drivers are attentive, pleasant. Highly recommend.

items.name: Katrin Manita
items.text: The trip was pleasant. Nikolay, thank you, you are the best driver!

first.title: on the market since 2012
first.description: We have extensive experience and thousands of successful trips across Ukraine and Europe.

second.title: Modern minibuses
second.description: Comfortable interiors, multimedia, air conditioning, Wi‑Fi and charging — everything for your convenience.

fourth.title: Transparent communication
fourth.description: No hidden fees. We clearly explain trip conditions and prices

fifth.title: Easy booking
fifth.description: The application takes up to 3 minutes, and you receive all details via a convenient messenger

sixth.title: Real communication — no bots
sixth.description: All requests are handled by our managers who truly understand your needs and respond promptly.

faq.title: Frequently asked questions from our clients

items.title: How often do trips to Europe run?
items.description: Trips to Europe from Ukraine operate every Thursday and Saturday. You can check the schedule at {telNumber}

items.title: How to order transportation or package delivery?
items.description: You can contact us by phone number, through a messenger, or by using the form on the website. Our manager will clarify the details, help with the paperwork, and reserve a seat or parcel delivery. We work quickly, responsibly, and with respect for every client.

items.title: How many passengers are in the minibus?
items.description: Trips to Europe are carried out in comfort and luxury class minibuses designed for 8 passengers. This provides more space, quiet, and maximum comfort during the journey.

items.title: Can I bring pets and what documents are needed for transporting pets abroad?
items.description: Yes, you can bring your pet with you. If the animal is up to 7 kilograms, it travels in your arms, an additional fee of 50€ is added to the ticket price. If the animal is from 7 kilograms, you need to take an additional seat. To transport pets to EU countries, you need: a veterinary passport, a valid rabies vaccination, a microchip, and a certificate from a state veterinary clinic. We help with the paperwork and ensure a comfortable trip for your pet to Europe.

items.title: Are there discounts for children?
items.description: We make a 10€ discount for children under 5 years old on the ticket price

items.title: How is payment made and is there a prepayment?
items.description: Booking is done with a 30€ prepayment by transfer to our account, the remainder is paid upon boarding in a way convenient for you. If you cancel the trip less than 14 days in advance, the prepayment is not refunded. Trip rescheduling is possible only once, no later than 7 days before departure.

items.title: How much luggage can I take with me?
items.description: The ticket price includes 2 suitcases with total weight 40kg and a small carry-on in the cabin, and you can also take additional luggage for a separate fee of 2€/kg

items.title: If you need to send luggage to Europe?
items.description: Minimum delivery cost is 50€, weight up to 25 kg, if more - 2€ per kg. Packaging suitcase or bag. It is not necessary to wrap luggage with film or tape, because each parcel is checked by the border service. Before handing over, you must attach all recipient's data with full address and phone number. You send us the list of parcel contents via messenger. Delivery time is from 24 hours to 4 days, depends on the route. In Europe, we pick up from the address, in Ukraine we work with Nova Poshta. You can view the list of allowed and prohibited items by [link](/parcels/poland) and also check by phone: {telNumber}

articles.title: Rules for transporting belongings to Europe: what you need to know
articles.description: International transportation of belongings to European Union countries is a process regulated by both Ukrainian legislation and EU regulations. If you are planning a move or transporting personal items, it is important to familiarize yourself with the rules in advance to avoid delays at the border, fines, or even confiscation of the cargo...

articles.title: How to properly prepare documents for a trip to Europe
articles.description: Preparing documents for a trip to European Union countries requires attention to detail. The success of your move and compliance with all necessary legal requirements depend on properly prepared documents...

articles.title: Transporting pets: specifics and requirements
articles.description: Transporting pets between countries has its own specifics and requirements. For successful transportation, it is necessary to follow veterinary standards and have the relevant documents...

articles.title: Choosing the optimal route for transportation to Europe
articles.description: Choosing the right route for transportation to Europe can significantly affect travel time, cost, and comfort. Let's look at the key factors to consider when planning a route...

articles.title: Cargo insurance in international transportation
articles.description: Cargo insurance is an important aspect of international transportation. Properly arranged insurance will protect your belongings from damage, loss, or delays en route...

about.title: About the company
about.p1: We specialize in passenger transportation to Poland, Germany, the Netherlands and Belgium. Our routes are designed to provide maximum comfort and safety during your journey.
about.p2: We strive to make every trip easy and carefree.

meta.title: Pet Transportation to Europe | Світ Сучасних Перевезень
meta.description: Safe pet transportation from Ukraine to Europe. Professional services for transporting dogs, cats and other pets. Comfortable conditions, compliance with all rules and requirements. Online booking.

petsAdditionalInfo.title: ADDITIONAL INFORMATION
petsAdditionalInfo.description: Current requirements apply to cats and dogs. For your trip with your pet to go smoothly, you must have all necessary documents and follow transportation rules.

petsPricing.title: PET TRANSPORTATION COST
petsPricing.smallAnimal: Animal up to 7 kilograms can travel in your arms — an additional fee is 50€.
petsPricing.largeAnimal: If the animal is from 7 kilograms, you must purchase a separate seat.

parcelsAdditionalInfo.minimumCost: Minimum delivery cost is 50€, weight up to 25 kg, if more – 2€ per kg.
parcelsAdditionalInfo.rules: Rules: Packaging must be in a suitcase or a bag. It is not necessary to wrap luggage with film or tape, because each parcel is checked by the border service. Before handing over, you must attach all recipient's data with full address and phone number. You send us the list of parcel contents via messenger.
parcelsAdditionalInfo.deliveryTime: Delivery time is from 24 hours to 4 days. In Europe, we pick up from the address, in Ukraine we work with Nova Poshta.

2.title: Optimized routes
2.description: We choose only reliable and proven roads to ensure fast delivery without delays.

3.title: Modern transport
3.description: Each vehicle undergoes a thorough inspection and maintenance before departure, which guarantees reliability on the road.

petsSecurity.title: SAFETY AND COMFORT
petsSecurity.text: Transportation with the World of Modern Transportation company is carried out by experienced drivers on buses from the reliable global manufacturer Mercedes. Driver experience — from 5 years. All minibuses undergo mandatory technical maintenance before each trip and are serviced only with original spare parts. Cabins are designed for 8 passenger seats instead of the standard 14, which provides more space for comfort on the road.

petsComfort.title: COMFORTABLE CONDITIONS FOR PEOPLE AND THEIR PETS

1.title: Travel together
1.description: Your pets travel with you under the owner's supervision. This guarantees peace of mind and reduces stress.

2.title: Convenient stops
2.description: Regular breaks for rest, walking and feeding ensure a comfortable journey for everyone.

3.title: Climate control
3.description: The cabin maintains an optimal temperature so the trip is comfortable for both people and pets.

4.title: Comfort on the road
4.description: We take care of cleanliness, space and all necessary amenities so that the trip is pleasant for both people and pets.

petsRules.title: RULES FOR PET TRANSPORTATION TO THE EU
petsRules.subtitle: Current requirements apply to cats and dogs. To ensure a trouble‑free trip, your pet must have:

1.title: Microchip
1.description: The animal must be chipped and correctly identified with a microchip.

2.title: Vaccination
2.description: Mandatory rabies vaccination performed according to current veterinary regulations.

3.title: Rabies test
3.description: A valid rabies antibody test result (titer test) is required.

4.title: Pet passport
4.description: An EU‑format veterinary passport or certificate confirming compliance with EU requirements. If the pet travels with an escort, confirmation may be requested.

meta.title: Parcel delivery to {country} from Ukraine | Світ Сучасних Перевезень
meta.description: Fast and reliable parcel delivery from Ukraine to {country}. Express delivery in 3 days, optimized routes, modern transport. Safe delivery of cargo and parcels.

1.title: Faster than mail
1.description: Delivery takes up to four days, as our buses run constantly, and border delays are minimized.

2.title: Optimized routes
2.description: We choose only reliable and proven routes to ensure fast delivery without delays.

3.title: Modern transport
3.description: Each vehicle undergoes thorough inspection and technical maintenance at a service station before departure, which guarantees reliability on the road.

parcelRules.title: WHAT CAN BE TRANSPORTED TO {country}?
parcelRules.subtitle: The list may be incomplete – please check with the dispatcher
parcelRules.disclaimer: The company is not responsible for violations of transportation rules.
parcelRules.coordination: Please coordinate the list with the manager.

parcelInfo.title: Need to quickly send a parcel or luggage to {country}? With us, it's easy!
parcelInfo.intro: World of Modern Transportation delivers small-sized cargo, parcel-transfers of personal belongings and suitcases. {countryNominative} {countryVerb} a second home for many Ukrainians today. That's why we organized convenient and regular flights so everyone can quickly and safely transfer things to their loved ones. We approach each client individually, offering the best solution for luggage delivery from Ukraine to {country} and back. Our drivers have years of international transportation experience and care for the safety of your belongings during transport. We value our clients' trust, so we guarantee timely delivery and careful attention to every parcel. Sending luggage with World of Modern Transportation is fast, convenient and reliable. We help with packing, labeling and choosing the optimal route so your belongings arrive without damage and exactly on time.
parcelInfo.description: Each shipment has its own characteristics — weight, dimensions, packaging method. That's why we always select individual transportation conditions for each client. It doesn't matter if you need to deliver a small parcel or transport large luggage by bus from Ukraine to {country} — World of Modern Transportation will provide optimal transport and reliable delivery. Your belongings are always safe from the moment of acceptance until arrival at the destination. Sending a parcel by bus from Ukraine to {country} is a fast, economical and proven delivery method. Our team controls all stages of transportation so your belongings arrive exactly on schedule and in perfect condition. Thanks to professional drivers and well-established logistics, you get confidence in every kilometer of the route. Contact our managers today to learn all the details about sending luggage and parcels to {country}. We guarantee comfortable service, reliability and transparent cooperation. World of Modern Transportation – your reliable partner in international deliveries

limits.title: WEIGHT AND VALUE LIMITS
items: To Poland duty‑free you may bring goods up to €300 (for land border crossers)
Baggage — up to 50 kg (if more, you may be asked to confirm it's not for commercial use)
